resources.string: Ooops! What happend? I can\'t find login web page of Plurk....
Would you mind check your Internet accessibility, maybe you switched off WiFi or 3G network?
Or is it because I\'m too useless?
BTW, here is error message from system: "%s"
There seems to be a problem, I can\'t log into Plurk.
Maybe it\'s my fault?
BTW, the system says it\'s caused by: "%s"
We have logged into Plurk.
Lin chan is fetching data from Plurk, please wait a moment.
Ooops, I can get data from Plurk.
Is network disconnected?
BTW, here is error message from system: "%s".
Timeline is fetched from Plurk successfully. Here is posts that belongs to "%s".
Any interesting thing happening?
Please also share with Lin chan if something interesting happened.
All %s message
My %s message
%s private message
%s responded message
%s favorited message
お帰りなさいませ、ご主人様。Welcome to Maidroid Plurk, you could slide this message box to continue.
That\'s right. I\'m Lin chan, it\'s my honor to serve you, my master.
It seems you are not logged in. Would you mind log in first? Or I can\'t get data from Plurk for you.
What? Why I can\'t fetch data from Plurk.....
Errrr....what does "%s" mean?
Can you please check internet access and try again, my master?
I have fetched latest posts from Plurk! There are %s new posts.
Is any interesting happening?
Sorry, there seems no new post in your timeline.
Would you mind try it again later?
I\'ve deleted this post for you.
Deleting
I\'m so sorry, I can\'t delete this post...
Here is error message from system: "%s"
Would you mind check internet connectivity and try it again?
Unread
Unread
